description: Returns the MatchingWorkflow with a given name, if it exists.

nested_items.name: workflowName
nested_items.description: The name of the workflow.

nested_items.name: workflowArn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) that Entity Resolution generated for the MatchingWorkflow.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the workflow.

nested_items.name: inputSourceConfig
nested_items.description: A list of InputSource objects, which have the fields InputSourceARN and SchemaName.

nested_items.name: inputSourceARN
nested_items.description: An Glue table Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the input source table.

nested_items.name: schemaName
nested_items.description: The name of the schema to be retrieved.

nested_items.name: applyNormalization
nested_items.description: Normalizes the attributes defined in the schema in the input data. For example, if an attribute has an AttributeType of PHONE_NUMBER, and the data in the input table is in a format of 1234567890, Entity Resolution will normalize this field in the output to (123)-456-7890.

nested_items.name: outputSourceConfig
nested_items.description: A list of OutputSource objects, each of which contains fields OutputS3Path, ApplyNormalization, and Output.

nested_items.name: outputS3Path
nested_items.description: The S3 path to which Entity Resolution will write the output table.

nested_items.name: KMSArn
nested_items.description: Customer KMS ARN for encryption at rest. If not provided, system will use an Entity Resolution managed KMS key.

nested_items.name: output
nested_items.description: A list of OutputAttribute objects, each of which have the fields Name and Hashed. Each of these objects selects a column to be included in the output table, and whether the values of the column should be hashed.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A name of a column to be written to the output. This must be an InputField name in the schema mapping.

nested_items.name: hashed
nested_items.description: Enables the ability to hash the column values in the output.

nested_items.name: applyNormalization
nested_items.description: Normalizes the attributes defined in the schema in the input data. For example, if an attribute has an AttributeType of PHONE_NUMBER, and the data in the input table is in a format of 1234567890, Entity Resolution will normalize this field in the output to (123)-456-7890.

nested_items.name: resolutionTechniques
nested_items.description: An object which defines the resolutionType and the ruleBasedProperties.

nested_items.name: resolutionType
nested_items.description: The type of matching. There are three types of matching: RULE_MATCHING, ML_MATCHING, and PROVIDER.

nested_items.name: ruleBasedProperties
nested_items.description: An object which defines the list of matching rules to run and has a field Rules, which is a list of rule objects.

nested_items.name: rules
nested_items.description: A list of Rule objects, each of which have fields RuleName and MatchingKeys.

nested_items.name: ruleName
nested_items.description: A name for the matching rule.

nested_items.name: matchingKeys
nested_items.description: A list of MatchingKeys. The MatchingKeys must have been defined in the SchemaMapping. Two records are considered to match according to this rule if all of the MatchingKeys match.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: attributeMatchingModel
nested_items.description: The comparison type. You can either choose ONE_TO_ONE or MANY_TO_MANY as the attributeMatchingModel.

nested_items.name: matchPurpose
nested_items.description: An indicator of whether to generate IDs and index the data or not.

nested_items.name: providerProperties
nested_items.description: The properties of the provider service.

nested_items.name: providerServiceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the provider service.

nested_items.name: providerConfiguration
nested_items.description: The required configuration fields to use with the provider service.

nested_items.name: intermediateSourceConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 location that temporarily stores your data while it processes. Your information won't be saved permanently.

nested_items.name: intermediateS3Path
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 location (bucket and prefix). For example: s3://provider_bucket/DOC-EXAMPLE-BUCKET.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the workflow was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the workflow was last updated.

nested_items.name: incrementalRunConfig
nested_items.description: An object which defines an incremental run type and has only incrementalRunType as a field.

nested_items.name: incrementalRunType
nested_items.description: The type of incremental run. It takes only one value: IMMEDIATE.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role. Entity Resolution assumes this role to access Amazon Web Services resources on your behalf.
(string) ---
(string) ---
